General.Name: CO2 Gro Inc
General.Description: CO2 Gro Inc., together with its subsidiaries, focuses on commercializing patent-licensed CO2 gas infusion technology and patent-pending US PTO CO2 delivery solutions system. The company operates in the United states and Canada. CO2 Gro Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 40 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3S1
